TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Indique qu’un type de collection doit être traité en tant que collection significative d’espaces blancs par un processeur XAML.

span.span: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `xml:space` est un concept connexe qui influence le traitement XAML des espaces blancs mais est orthogonal à l’objectif de .`xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of . Pour plus d’informations, consultez [traitement des espaces blancs en XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md).For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md). Dans les versions précédentes du .NET Framework, cette classe existait dans l’assembly WindowsBase spécifique de WPF.In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. Dans [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], est dans l’assembly System.Xaml.In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. Pour plus d'informations, consultez [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## Remarques sur l'utilisation de WPFWPF Usage Notes est un exemple [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classe où cet attribut est appliqué. is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied.
